vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ἄζῡμος, ον,
without process of fermentation, [Refs 5th c.BC+]:—of bread, unleavened, ἄρτος[Refs 5th c.BC+]; ἄρτους ἀ., ἄζυμα λάγανα, [LXX]the feast of unleavened cakes, [NT]; ἡ ἑορτὴ τῶν ἀ. [LXX+NT]
vocabInfos.shortDef: unleavened, (the Feast of) Unleavened Bread, made without yeast; figuratively of purity
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
unleavened, (the Feast of) Unleavened Bread, made without yeast; figuratively of purity
made without yeast;, τὰ ἄζυμα, metaphorically pure from foreign matter, unadulterated, genuine; τὸ ἄζυμον, genuineness, 1Cor. 5:7, 8
vocabInfos._es_Definition: sin levadura, ácimo ; fiesta judía del pan sin levadura ;
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1)(實名詞) 無酵餅
2)(實名詞) 除酵節
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1)(实名词) 无酵饼
2)(实名词) 除酵节
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: không men; theo nghĩa ẩn dụ: không có lỗi
